channel.title: Sycl on oneAPI Community Page
channel.description: Recent content in Sycl on oneAPI Community Page

item.title: SYCL FNIRS Motion Detectio
item.description: SYCL machine learning libraries to detect motion detection in fNIRS.

item.title: MuSYCL
item.description: This is a small music synthesizer to experiment with C++23 programming, design patterns and acceleration on hardware accelerators like GPU, FPGA or CGRA with the SYCL 2020 standard.

item.title: Sycl Collision Sim
item.description: Example SYCL implementation of collision detection

item.title: Parallel Spmv Sycl Multi Queue
item.description: Sylc version of parallelSpnv using multiple queues for the solution

item.title: Dwarf Bench
item.description: “Dwarf bench” is a collection of patterns that attempt to capture performance characteristics of analytical queries. The idea is to extend the taxonomy of computational patterns defined in the article “The Landscape of Parallel Computing Research” published in 2006 to data analytics in heterogeneous environments. Implementing basic structures and algorithms once for multiple devices strives to find a balance between performance and specific capabilities usage, and implementation effort. We chose platform-agnostic tools to express our language of patterns (OpenCL, SYCL).

item.title: VapourSynth BilateralGPU
item.description: Bilateral filter is a non-linear, edge-preserving and noise-reducing smoothing filter for images. The intensity value at each pixel in an image is replaced by a weighted average of intensity values from nearby pixels. This weight can be based on a Gaussian distribution.

item.title: Altis Sycl
item.description: Altis-SYCL is a SYCL-based implementation of the Altis GPGPU benchmark suite (originally written in CUDA) for CPUs, GPUs, and FPGAs. Altis-SYCL has been migrated from CUDA using the DPC++ Compatibility Tool (DPCT) of oneAPI v2022.1. Our main focus is to evaluate the performance of these GPU-tailored SYCL kernels and to investigate their optimization potential for FPGAs. For some cases, minor code changes were made to speedup the FPGA port as our interest lies in the achievable performance without major rework of the kernels.

item.title: Neural Network Sim
item.description: Neural Network Simulation Written in C++ using Intel OneAPI and ImGUI Libraries.

item.title: Sycl Test Offload
item.description: A sandbox for testing a SYCL-enabled DLL + a non-SYCL test program.

item.title: Xpu
item.description: Compile and run C++ code with CUDA, HIP, SYCL or OpenMP.

item.title: OneAPI FPGA
item.description: Developing Applications using Intel® oneAPI for FPGAs

item.title: OneAPI Crystal
item.description: SYCL implementation of the Crystal library for SQL queries on GPU and CPU, based on http://anilshanbhag.in/static/papers/crystal_sigmod20.pdf

item.title: Mkl Verbose Toolkit
item.description: We propose script to facilitate the generation and the parsing of Math Verbose log file: To parse the log file and generate summary tables, use mkl_parse.py or cublas_parse.py To restrict the verbosity for one MPI_RANK, use mkl_hook wrapper.

item.title: oneAPI Antispoofing
item.description: Certiface AntiSpoofing use oneAPI for fast decode video for perform liveness detection with inference.
